bottom.padding.chatimage.tooltip:
The distance between the picture and the bottom border
Range: 0-half the vertical length of the window
cq.chatimage.tooltip: When turned on, [CQ:image] will be recognized
experimental.component.chatimage.tooltip:
(Experimental) Used for compatibility with text components in certain special cases.
If text formatting errors occur, please try disabling this feature.
gif.chatimage.tooltip:
The playback speed of GIF images
Range: 1 ~ 20
height.limit.chatimage.tooltip:
Image horizontal length limit
Range: 1 ~ window horizontal length
image.drag.chatimage.tooltip: Drag files will be recognized when turned on
left.padding.chatimage.tooltip:
The distance between the image and the left border
Range: 0-half the horizontal length of the window
nsfw.chatimage.message: This is a NSFW image, click to remove NSFW to view, or turn off the NSFW warning in the configuration file
nsfw.chatimage.open: Are you sure you want to open the NSFW image from the link below?
nsfw.chatimage.tooltip:
On: View warnings for "NSFW=true" pictures
Off: No warning
nsfw.chatimage.warning: The NSFW image may cause discomfort, please open it with caution
padding.chatimage.tooltip: Set the size of the image display when hovering
right.padding.chatimage.tooltip:
The distance between the image and the right border
Range: 0-half the horizontal length of the window
send.chatimage.command: Send CICode with display name and url
server_file_load_error.chatimage.excepti: The image from the server failed to load
timeout.chatimage.tooltip:
Image loading timeout, after exceeding, it will automatically display loading failure
Range: 3 ~ 60s
top.padding.chatimage.tooltip:
The distance between the picture and the top border
Range: 0-half the vertical length of the window
url.chatimage.command: Send CICode with url (use default display name)
width.limit.chatimage.tooltip:
Picture vertical length limit
Range: 1 ~ window vertical length
